channel.title: Live on A Rambling Mind
channel.description: Recent content in Live on A Rambling Mind

item.title: cr.h: A Simple C Hot Reload Header-only Library
item.description: Recently I’ve been back to hobby coding simple C stuff, and one project that I’m doing with a friend tries to simple emulate some old game. The idea is really basic, but we want to do it in the C-style without over engineering or losing track of the hobby feeling. But! It is really hard to not care at least a bit, even if it is just hobby stuff. I got literally side-tracked at one point and here I describe why and the resulting product of this.
